TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BamlLocalizabilityResolver extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in binary XAML (BAML).

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizabilityResolver> 使って、<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer>クラスやプロパティのローカライズ設定を解決するために[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]します。 両方のリソースの抽出、およびローカライズされた時に競合回避モジュールが呼び出されます[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]が更新されます。
リソースの抽出時に (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer.ExtractResources%2A>)、競合回避モジュール。
- 提供<xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute>クラスやプロパティの[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]ときに、<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer>ローカライズ可能なリソースを作成しています。
- 内の要素の書式設定を提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]要素はインライン タグとして書式設定するようにします。
時刻をローカライズする at[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]が更新されます (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer.UpdateBaml%2A>)、競合回避モジュール。
- クラスに書式設定タグを解決します。
- クラス定義を含むアセンブリの名前を解決します。
- <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizabilityResolver> クラスの関数の実際の方法を実行する内部クラスによってサブクラス化は<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer>します。

MemberSignature.Value: protected BamlLocalizabilityResolver ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: BamlLocalizabilityResolver();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability (string assembly, string className);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability(string assembly, string className) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetElementLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String) As ElementLocalizability
public: abstract System::Windows::Markup::Localizer::ElementLocalizability ^ GetElementLocalizability(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ className);
abstract member GetElementLocalizability : string * string -> System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability

Docs.param: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.
The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified type of element can be localized and, if so, whether it can be formatted inline.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the localizability information for the specified assembly and element.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute GetPropertyLocalizability (string assembly, string className, string property);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute GetPropertyLocalizability(string assembly, string className, string property) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetPropertyLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String, property As String) As LocalizabilityAttribute
public: abstract System::Windows::LocalizabilityAttribute ^ GetPropertyLocalizability(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ className, System::String ^ property);
abstract member GetPropertyLocalizability : string * string * string -> System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute

Docs.param: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.
The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.
The name of the property that you want to retrieve localizability information for.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified property of a specified type of element can be localized.
Docs.returns: An object that specifies whether and how the property can be localized.

Public MustOverride Function ResolveAssemblyFromClass (className As String) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveAssemblyFromClass(System::String ^ className);
abstract member ResolveAssemblyFromClass : string -> string

Docs.summary: Returns the full name of the assembly that contains the specified class.
Docs.returns: The full name of the assembly that contains the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ResolveFormattingTagToClass (string formattingTag);

Public MustOverride Function ResolveFormattingTagToClass (formattingTag As String) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveFormattingTagToClass(System::String ^ formattingTag);

Docs.summary: Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].
Docs.returns: The full class name associated with the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドが呼び出されます、<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer>または同等がローカライズ可能なリソースへの置換を適用します。 代替文字列で書式設定タグが発生した場合は、書式設定タグをクラス名に解決するこのメソッドが呼び出されます。
